org.apache.juneau.examples.rest

Class PhotosResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.RestServlet
          • org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.BasicRestServlet
            • org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.PhotosResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, BasicJsonConfig, BasicUniversalConfig, BasicRestOperations

    public class PhotosResource
extends BasicRestServlet
implements BasicUniversalConfig
    Sample resource that allows images to be uploaded and retrieved.
    • REST Marshalling
    • ImageSerializer
    • ImageParser
    • Source
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
